reviews.review_text:
First experience 5/5
Second visit 2/5

Service is good, atmosphere is nice too.

The food is tasty, but given the price, you'd expect hot food, both dishes were served cold. (after explicitly asking to make sure the food was hot)

Customer feedback: given the price you charge, make sure food is FRESH AND SERVED HOT.

But i really do appreciate the head chef and the waiters checking in on us and amending the dishes.

Good service really saved the lunch ðŸ˜Š

Good vibes, good food, good hospitality, kids playing area, parking available.

Details below

1. Food: 4/5
Food is good here especially if you would like to have the sea food. One portion can do a serving for 4 persons easily.

2. Ambience: 4/5
The place is situated adjacent to the backwaters. You can see fishermen around, ships crossing the place etc. There will be a little foul smell of fishes but that's how the still backwater is at any place. There's a good DJ playing some nice party songs. It's a loud music party kind of place. They will provide the river side table if available.

3. Service/staff: 4/5
Staff is courteous, polite and professional. Service time is fine, they can serve everything within 15 minutes even when it is crowded which is good. They are knowledgeable about what they are serving. They check with you about your preferences which is a good thing.

Parking: They have got parking for more than 20 cars.

Accesibiliy: Although the place is at ground floor itself, there are small 1-2 steps at entry and inside.

They also have a small kids playing area with slides and swings.

Washrooms are clean.

Review based on visit in November 2024.

An amazing location by the river. A very traditional looking place .... appears as if a large typical Goan house has been converted into a restaurant. Very homely. Food and drinks were excellent. Staff made us feel very comfortable.
